00114 /* duplicate the slot with name given by sym from src to dest */
00115 
00116 #define slot_dup(dest, src, sym)  SET_SLOT(dest, sym, duplicate(GET_SLOT(src, sym)))
00117 
00118 /* is not yet used: */
00119 #define slot_nonNull_dup(dest, src, sym)                        \
00120     if(GET_SLOT(src, sym) != R_NilValue)                        \
00121         SET_SLOT(dest, sym, duplicate(GET_SLOT(src, sym)))
00122 
00123 #define slot_dup_if_has(dest, src, sym)                         \
00124     if(R_has_slot(src, sym))                                    \
00125         SET_SLOT(dest, sym, duplicate(GET_SLOT(src, sym)))

00132 #define uplo_P(_x_) CHAR(STRING_ELT(GET_SLOT(_x_, Matrix_uploSym), 0))
00133 #define diag_P(_x_) CHAR(STRING_ELT(GET_SLOT(_x_, Matrix_diagSym), 0))

00136 // Define this "Cholmod compatible" to some degree
00137 enum x_slot_kind {x_pattern=-1, x_double=0, x_logical=1, x_integer=2, x_complex=3};
00138 
00139 /* should also work for "matrix" matrices: */
00140 #define Real_KIND(_x_)  (IS_S4_OBJECT(_x_) ? Real_kind(_x_) : \
00141                          (isReal(_x_) ? x_double : (isLogical(_x_) ? x_logical : -1)))
00142 /* This one gives '0' also for integer "matrix" :*/
00143 #define Real_KIND2(_x_) (IS_S4_OBJECT(_x_) ? Real_kind(_x_) : \
00144                          (isLogical(_x_) ? x_logical : 0))
00145 
00146 /* requires 'x' slot: */
00147 #define Real_kind(_x_)  (isReal(GET_SLOT(_x_, Matrix_xSym)) ? 0 :       \
00148                          (isLogical(GET_SLOT(_x_, Matrix_xSym)) ? 1 : -1))

00150 #define DECLARE_AND_GET_X_SLOT(__C_TYPE, __SEXP)        \
00151     __C_TYPE *xx = __SEXP(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym))

00162 static R_INLINE
00163 int packed_ncol(int len)
00164 {
00165     int disc = 8 * len + 1;     /* discriminant */
00166     int sqrtd = (int) sqrt((double) disc);
00167 
00168     if (len < 0 || disc != sqrtd * sqrtd)
00169         error(_("invalid 'len' = %d in packed_ncol"));
00170     return (sqrtd - 1)/2;
00171 }
00172 
00191 static R_INLINE
00192 SEXP ALLOC_SLOT(SEXP obj, SEXP nm, SEXPTYPE type, int length)
00193 {
00194     SEXP val = allocVector(type, length);
00195 
00196     SET_SLOT(obj, nm, val);
00197     return val;
00198 }

00210 static R_INLINE
00211 int* expand_cmprPt(int ncol, const int mp[], int mj[])
00212 {
00213     int j;
00214     for (j = 0; j < ncol; j++) {
00215         int j2 = mp[j+1], jj;
00216         for (jj = mp[j]; jj < j2; jj++) mj[jj] = j;
00217     }
00218     return mj;
00219 }
00220 
00228 static R_INLINE
00229 Rboolean any_NA_in_x(SEXP obj)
00230 {
00231     double *x = REAL(GET_SLOT(obj, Matrix_xSym));
00232     int i, n = LENGTH(GET_SLOT(obj, Matrix_xSym));
00233     for(i=0; i < n; i++)
00234         if(ISNAN(x[i])) return TRUE;
00235     /* else */
00236     return FALSE;
00237 }

00256 static R_INLINE SEXP
00257 mMatrix_as_dgeMatrix(SEXP A)
00258 {
00259     return strcmp(class_P(A), "dgeMatrix") ? dup_mMatrix_as_dgeMatrix(A) : A;
00260 }
00261 
00262 static R_INLINE SEXP
00263 mMatrix_as_geMatrix(SEXP A)
00264 {
00265     return strcmp(class_P(A) + 1, "geMatrix") ? dup_mMatrix_as_geMatrix(A) : A;
00266 }

00277 static R_INLINE int
00278 Matrix_check_class(const char *class, char **valid)
00279 {
00280     int ans;
00281     for (ans = 0; ; ans++) {
00282         if (!strlen(valid[ans])) return -1;
00283         if (!strcmp(class, valid[ans])) return ans;
00284     }
00285 }
